headers: SCOPE CUTS — WHAT'S IN, WHAT'S DEFERRED

rows.SCOPE CUTS — WHAT'S IN, WHAT'S DEFERRED: Reducing scope to match zero-cash, speed-to-production reality.

rows.col_3: Rationale
Stripe Atlas. $500. Must happen Week 0.
Free spreadsheet template. Blocks all equity grants.
Claude-drafted PM/Expert/MC agreements. Lawyer review post-funding.
Mercury free tier when needed. Not blocking for imagination phase.
Not needed until selling product.
Use ™ common law. File when funded.
Needed before selling, not before imagining.
No revenue = no accounting needed yet.
Trade secrets via NDA in agreements (I9). Formal IP protection post-funding.
Post-funding problem.

rows.SCOPE CUTS — WHAT'S IN, WHAT'S DEFERRED: CL-7 and CL-8 are post-launch operations clusters. You don't need verified operating playbooks before selling a single unit.

rows.col_3: What It Contains
Post-launch operations — customer service, fulfillment scaling, retention playbooks, operational SOPs
rows.col_4: These are execution artifacts. You need them when you're running the business, not when you're designing it. Build them when the CoS/Operator is hired and has real operational data.

rows.col_3: Growth/scaling operations — channel expansion, international, B2B, partnerships at scale
rows.col_4: Premature optimization. You haven't sold unit #1. Scaling playbooks without baseline data are fiction.

rows.SCOPE CUTS — WHAT'S IN, WHAT'S DEFERRED: After scope cuts, active production = CL-0 through CL-6 + I1/I4/I9 only.

rows.col_3: Thesis clusters. M0. Nilo + Claude. Foundation for everything.
People & Culture. Elaine's cluster. Recruiting, roles, labor architecture.
Studio Operations. Conductor's cluster. Scheduling, sequencing, tools.
Product & Supply Chain. Formulation, suppliers, COGS, packaging.
Marketing & Creative. Funnel, creative strategy, media buying, brand.
Finance & Strategy. Unit economics, financial model, fundraising.
Content & Distribution. MC show, content strategy, distribution. Large cluster — may need split.
Post-launch operations. Build post-funding with real data.
Growth/scaling. Build post-funding with real data.
Entity, cap table, agreements. The 3 legal workstreams that can't wait.

rows.SCOPE CUTS — WHAT'S IN, WHAT'S DEFERRED: Cutting CL-7/CL-8 removes 2 PM sprints + 2 expert reviews from the recruiting load.
Active clusters = 7 (CL-0 through CL-6). CL-0 is Nilo. So Recruiter sources PMs for 6 clusters, not 8.
Expert advisors needed for 6 clusters, not 8. PMs find their own.
Total people to recruit drops from ~30 to ~20. Much more feasible.
